Chinese.name: 视频拼接
Chinese.description: 本示例使用API网关触发器和云函数快速构建视频剪辑服务，实现对多个视频的拼接，同时加上背景音乐。并通过回调返回处理结果。
Chinese.attention: 本示例使用到了API网关触发器，返回值需要构造为Json格式。此模版用于生产环境前请先确保代码符合业务需求。

English.name: VideoSplice
English.description: This demo uses API GW trigger and SCF to build video splice service.
English.attention: This demo has been used api gw. So the return value should be json format based on the requirement. Please make sure that the code meets your business requirements.
